alert.note: Alert for Buchanan; Dickenson (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued August 07 at 4:57PM EDT until August 07 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 599 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 6 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN SOUTHWEST VIRGINIA BUCHANAN DICKENSON IN WEST VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 23 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL WEST VIRGINIA BRAXTON CALHOUN CLAY GILMER NICHOLAS ROANE WEBSTER IN NORTHERN WEST VIRGINIA LEWIS POCAHONTAS RANDOLPH UPSHUR IN SOUTHERN WEST VIRGINIA BOONE FAYETTE KANAWHA LINCOLN LOGAN MCDOWELL MINGO PUTNAM RALEIGH WYOMING IN WESTERN WEST VIRGINIA CABELL WAYNE THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALUM CREEK, BECKLEY, BUCKHANNON, BURNSVILLE, CEREDO, CHAPMANVILLE, CHARLESTON, CLAY, CLINTWOOD, CRAIGSVILLE, ELKINS, FAYETTEVILLE, GARY, GASSAWAY, GLENVILLE, GRANTSVILLE, GRUNDY, HAMLIN, HARTS, HUNTINGTON, HURRICANE, KENOVA, LOGAN, MADISON, MAN, MARLINTON, MULLENS, OAK HILL, OCEANA, PINEVILLE, RICHWOOD, SAINT ALBANS, SOUTH CHARLESTON, SPENCER, SUMMERSVILLE, SUTTON, TEAYS VALLEY, VANSANT, WAR, WAYNE, WEBSTER SPRINGS, WELCH, WESTON, AND WILLIAMSON.
